de.esoco.lib.comm

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.lib.comm.Connection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, org.obrel.core.Relatable

    public class Connection
extends org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
implements Closeable
    The base class for all kinds of connections handled by the communication framework.

      Returns the current password for this connection, either from the relations or from the URI.

      Returns an URI instance for the final endpoint of this connection.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the object. It is recommended that implementations handle multiple invocations and problems that occur while closing gracefully. In cases where a problem is caused by inconsistencies in the runtime environment or similar issues (or will cause them) a documented RuntimeException should be thrown.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
